sections.heading: insurance; insurable interest required
sections.text: No policy of insurance shall be issued upon any property except in the name of some party having an interest in the property.SourceLaws 1913, c. 154, § 34, p. 413;R.S.1913, § 3170;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. IV, § 5, p. 591;C.S.1922, § 7770;C.S.1929, § 44-3
